area_name: El Corrádor, AKA The Corridor / Hill Top Area.

content.description: Awesome sustained technical edging low ball traverse with classic arête to mantle finish.
content.location:
Traverse right side of El Corrádor from right to left. Finish as for The SW Passage.

This would also be the South side of Little Brother.

content.description: Classic bouldery sit start on technical arête. Lie back arête low while utilizing giant side pull jug out left until it becomes possible to heel hook on left side pull jug and clear the lip to the mantle.
content.protection: Ok landing, kind of a but buster on rock behind you. With a couple pads it's not bad at all.
content.location:
SW Passage is the obvious short arête that makes up the back right side of El Corrádor.

This would also be the South West arête of the Little Brother.

Sit start low and climb overhanging left side of arête.

content.description: This little rock making up the beginning left part of a The Corridor, has a few fun but short problems!
content.location: Mini slab located on east side of little Brother. Climbs are on North side of slab. Climbers left as you approach El Corridor.

content.description: MBS starts low on cutter edges, then reachy moves and tech foot beta will get you to a super crimp rail about 10' up. Top out from here straight up or out left.
content.location: Two variations to start, located on North Face of Middle Brother and/or left side of El Corrádor as viewed from approach.

climbs.name: Middle Bother Traverse, AKA Traverse of the Corridor.

content.description: One of the hardest traverses at Melrose. Start as of Ollie JuJu, traversing right and staying low on extremely beta intensive maneuvers. Once you make it to Araña Gigantico pull the Mantle and continue right on easier ground!
content.protection: Good landing, shuffle pad as needed.
content.location:
Middle Brother Traverse starts on the North side of Middle Brother. Just left of Ollie JuJu.

This would also be the South side of El Corridor.

Traverse left to right!

content.description:
Try not to give yourself a hernia while trying to throw for this wicked side pull mantle to the seam.

From there climb easy ground up and right.
content.location: Located on the far back left of El Corrádor and/or north west arête of Middle Brother.

pathTokens: El Corrádor, AKA The Corridor / Hill Top Area.
